metadata.name: Piece of Candy
metadata.description:
"A true feast for the eyes that is sure to leave you with a sweet tooth and a smile on your face."

A piece of candy made entirely of Bonbon confectionery, said to have been dropped by BONBON Pixel Rabbits. Beyond its playful pixelated appearance, its true purpose in The Usagi Houseâ„¢ remains unknown.
